trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by the **Load** method when an error is found in the XSLT style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 就會擲回的例外狀況**負載**XSLT 樣式表中發現錯誤時的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref> class using the information in the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref>類別使用中的資訊<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>物件。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""></xref> object containing all the properties of an <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""> </xref>物件，其中包含的所有屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""></xref> object containing the context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""> </xref>物件，其中包含內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref> class specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不指定了任何內部例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that threw the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref>.
The location path of the style sheet.
The line number indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 指出在樣式表中發生錯誤的行號。

trans-unit.source: The line position indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 指出在樣式表中發生錯誤的行位置。

trans-unit.source: Streams all the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref> properties into the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class for the given <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 所有資料流<xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref>屬性<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>給定<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>類別
